comment._content: Caton Avenue east of Flatbush Avenue, from Atlas of Long Island, 1873, Beers, Comstock & Cline,  in Brooklyn the Way it Was (Merlis, 1995).

comment._content: On June 29, 2011, ltrupiano suggested where this photo was taken; thank you for your efforts to #mapBK!
